title: overviewer生成1.12.2地图Could not find the textures...的问题
author: shadeym
txt_content:
用overviewer-0.12.280生成地图，地图的版本是1.12.2，然而报错如下：
2018-12-02 08:46:28 E Could not find the textures while searching for 'assets/minecraft/textures/blocks/grass_top.png'. Try specifying the 'texturepath' option in your config file.
Set it to the path to a Minecraft Resource pack.
Alternately, install the Minecraft client (which includes textures)
Also see <http://docs.overviewer.org/en/la ... ng-the-textures>
(Remember, this version of Overviewer requires a 1.12-compatible resource pack)
(Also note that I won't automatically use snapshots; you'll have to use the texturepath option to use a snapshot jar)


看起来这个意思是要我用官方启动器下载1.12的jar，于是我又用官方启动器弄好了1.12的jar，但是依然出现这个报错。
感觉可能跟他说的“texturepath”有关，但是“texturepath”在哪里设置啊？我找教程也看不太懂
希望有人能够帮忙解决一下

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
他的意思是缺少这个材质，补全就行吧。

assets/minecraft/textures/blocks/grass_top.png

尝试在配置文件中指定“texturepath”选项。

replies.author: shadeym
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2018-12-2 15:44
他的意思是缺少这个材质，补全就行吧。

assets/minecraft/textures/blocks/grass_top.png
这个意思很容易看懂，但是并不知道在哪里补全，软件里没有这个路径
